name: @genstack.js/config
description: Internal configurations used by the Genstack toolkit

scripts.build: pnpm run gen && pnpm run build:types
scripts.gen: pkl eval -f json ./src/master.pkl | bun run --bun ./scripts/constants.mts && bun run --bun ./scripts/build.mts
scripts.check: pnpm build && pnpm biome check && tsc --noEmit && pnpx publint && pnpm run pkglint
